text: And he suffered an alcoholic seizure and was gravely ill in hospital with a diabetic and heart condition. His return to Dublin was heralded by the announcement he was "off the gargle" - a retired alcoholic. Since then he has been heard of often in the newspapers - three times up before the beaks for drunk and disorderly conduct.
handwritten_text: And he suffered an alcoholic seizure and was gravely ill in hospital with a diabetic and heart condition. His return to Dublin was heralded by the announcement he was "off the gargle" - a retired alcoholic. Since then he has been heard of often in the newspapers - three times up before the beaks for drunk and disorderly conduct.
